EmailTemplate.name: SE2 ACTION DAY EMAIL
EmailTemplate.subject: Feedback- WIN PRIZES!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We need your Feedback for the Big Sleep Out!
Fill in this form for your chance to win a Â£20 Nandos voucher!
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1PXFkqlMgniWS9iT-DRoUr7Vs-WrvTksuc3YcXu5bmAY/viewform
Keep raising money! I know lots of you said you had people wanting to donate so please make the most of the amazing thing you did!
LAUNCHPAD:- https://www.justgiving.com/NCSTheChallenegeBigSleepOut
Share this page with friends and family!
You can also text donate by texting the code NCSC47 with the amount you wish to donate to 70070!
SHOC:- https://www.justgiving.com/SHOC/
Press 'Donate' and select the amount.
Please email tcs.bucksandberks@the-challenge.org with how much you donated as sadly we won't be able to see!
The photos from the evening can be found here:-
https://www.facebook.com/tcs.bucksandberks/
Thanks so much
Amy
Assistant Graduate Manager The Challenge Reading Office tcs.bucksandberks@the-challenge.org
07469151467
Find us online: Website | Twitter | Facebook
The Challenge is a major provider of NCS (National Citizen Service)
The Challenge is in The Sunday Times 100 Best Not For Profit organisations to work for 2014.
